E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/29/1988
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Tom Brookens



Date: Sunday, 6/1/1988
Subject: Progress of George Hinshaw
Dear Sir,
George Hinshaw is hitting the ball well at A Modesto A's!
He has an AVG of .481, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 6/5/1988
Subject: Progress of Mike Butcher
Dear Sir,
Mike Butcher has nothing more to prove at AA Huntsville Stars!
He has an ERA of 2.91 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Friday, 6/6/1988
Subject: Roger Holt learns new position
Roger Holt has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Shortstop.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director
